backend/main.mo: Motoko canister providing CRUD operations for products, reps, consignments, sales, returns, and payouts using Map-based storage with incremental IDs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to frontend files, components, requirements, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing one-line summaries for all major frontend components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme definitions using OKLCH variables for light/dark modes, including print styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with all entity routes and wraps the app in ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout component with header, navigation tabs, main container, and footer for consistent UI structure.
frontend/src/components/CommissionSettin: Dialog for editing default and per-rep commission rates with validation and persistence.
Provides a popover-based UI for selecting and clearing start/end dates using date inputs.
Renders a list editor for product line items with add, update, and remove capabilities, optionally including unit price fields.
frontend/src/components/ProductSelect.ts: Dropdown selector that loads products via useProducts and displays names with formatted prices.
frontend/src/components/RepSelect.tsx: Dropdown selector that loads reps via useReps and displays their names.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for loading and mutating products, reps, consignments, sales, and returns using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables and print styles.
frontend/src/lib/calculations.ts: Computes rep financial balances and inventory quantities from sales, returns, payouts, and consignments with optional date filtering.
frontend/src/lib/commissionSettings.ts: Loads, saves, and updates commission settings including default and per-rep overrides using localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/csv.ts: Generates CSV strings, triggers downloads, and formats dates and currency values.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Provides helpers for month boundaries, formatting month/year, and retrieving the current month.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ConsignmentsPage.tsx: UI for listing, filtering, exporting, and adding consignments with date range filtering.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays rep balances and inventory summaries with CSV export and commission settings access.
frontend/src/pages/PayoutsPage.tsx: Manages payout records including creation, filtering, and CSV export.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Lists, searches, exports, and adds products with basic validation.
frontend/src/pages/RepsPage.tsx: UI page for listing, searching, exporting, and adding reps with a dialog form and CSV export.
frontend/src/pages/ReturnsPage.tsx: Page to record returns with rep/product selection, date filtering, CSV export, and a modal for adding line-item returns.
frontend/src/pages/SalesPage.tsx: Sales entry page supporting rep selection, line-item sales creation, date filtering, and CSV export.
frontend/src/pages/StatementsPage.tsx: Generates monthly statements for reps with filters for rep and period, showing sales, returns, payouts, and balances with print support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme settings, colors, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, features, requirements, and architectural notes for ConsignFlow.
